speaker: KENT
text_entry: SCENE IV. The same. A tent.

speaker: KENT
text_entry: Enter, with drum and colours, CORDELIA, Doctor, and Soldiers

speaker: CORDELIA
text_entry: Alack, 'tis he: why, he was met even now

speaker: CORDELIA
text_entry: As mad as the vex'd sea; singing aloud;

speaker: CORDELIA
text_entry: Crown'd with rank fumiter and furrow-weeds,

speaker: CORDELIA
text_entry: With bur-docks, hemlock, nettles, cuckoo-flowers,

speaker: CORDELIA
text_entry: Darnel, and all the idle weeds that grow

speaker: CORDELIA
text_entry: In our sustaining corn. A century send forth;

speaker: CORDELIA
text_entry: Search every acre in the high-grown field,

speaker: CORDELIA
text_entry: And bring him to our eye.

speaker: CORDELIA
text_entry: Exit an Officer

speaker: CORDELIA
text_entry: What can man's wisdom

speaker: CORDELIA
text_entry: In the restoring his bereaved sense?

speaker: CORDELIA
text_entry: He that helps him take all my outward worth.

speaker: Doctor
text_entry: There is means, madam:

speaker: Doctor
text_entry: Our foster-nurse of nature is repose,

speaker: Doctor
text_entry: The which he lacks; that to provoke in him,

speaker: Doctor
text_entry: Are many simples operative, whose power

speaker: Doctor
text_entry: Will close the eye of anguish.

speaker: CORDELIA
text_entry: All blest secrets,

speaker: CORDELIA
text_entry: All you unpublish'd virtues of the earth,

speaker: CORDELIA
text_entry: Spring with my tears! be aidant and remediate

speaker: CORDELIA
text_entry: In the good man's distress! Seek, seek for him;

speaker: CORDELIA
text_entry: Lest his ungovern'd rage dissolve the life

speaker: CORDELIA
text_entry: That wants the means to lead it.

speaker: CORDELIA
text_entry: Enter a Messenger

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: News, madam;

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: The British powers are marching hitherward.

speaker: CORDELIA
text_entry: 'Tis known before; our preparation stands

speaker: CORDELIA
text_entry: In expectation of them. O dear father,

speaker: CORDELIA
text_entry: It is thy business that I go about;

speaker: CORDELIA
text_entry: Therefore great France

speaker: CORDELIA
text_entry: My mourning and important tears hath pitied.

speaker: CORDELIA
text_entry: No blown ambition doth our arms incite,

speaker: CORDELIA
text_entry: But love, dear love, and our aged father's right:

speaker: CORDELIA
text_entry: Soon may I hear and see him!

speaker: CORDELIA
text_entry: Exeunt
